title: Elemental (SpliceHack)
data:
[SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") adds many new varieties of [elemental](/wiki/Elemental "Elemental") E monsters.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Mud elemental](#Mud_elemental)

  - [1.1 Generation](#Generation)
  - [1.2 Messages](#Messages)

- [2 Acid elemental](#Acid_elemental)

- [3 Ice elemental](#Ice_elemental)

- [4 Magma elemental](#Magma_elemental)

  - [4.1 Generation](#Generation_2)
  - [4.2 Strategy](#Strategy)
  - [4.3 Messages](#Messages_2)

- [5 Plasma elemental](#Plasma_elemental)
  - [5.1 Generation](#Generation_3)

- [6 Fusion elemental](#Fusion_elemental)

  - [6.1 Generation](#Generation_4)
  - [6.2 Strategy](#Strategy_2)
  - [6.3 Messages](#Messages_3)

- [7 History](#History)

- [8 References](#References)

## Mud elemental

| E mud elemental *(No tile)*                                     |                          |
| --------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")** | 11                       |
| **Attacks**                                                     | Claw 4d6, Claw 1d6 blind |
|                                                                 |                          |

| E mud elemental *(No tile)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                                            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | 11                                                                                                         |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                            |

| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 0 (neutral)                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                            |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 0 (Not randomly generated)                                                                                 |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | No                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                            |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 2500                                                                                                       |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | 0                                                                                                          |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | Huge                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                            |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | fire, cold, poison, petrification                                                                          |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | None                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                            |
| A mud elemental:* can [swim](/wiki/Swim "Swim").
* can [phase](/wiki/Phase "Phase") through walls.
* can [survive underwater](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious").
* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* [does not have a solid form](/wiki/Unsolid "Unsolid").
* has a [thick hide](/wiki/Thick-skinned "Thick-skinned").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                            |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | [SpliceHack 1.1.0 monst.c L2188](https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/monst.c#L2188) |

**Mud elementals** are very similar to earth elementals, but have an extra [blinding](/wiki/Blind "Blind") attack and the ability to [swim](/wiki/Swim "Swim").

### Generation

Mud elementals are never randomly generated. If an earth elemental is hit with a [wand of water](/wiki/Wand_of_water "Wand of water"), it will turn into a mud elemental.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) Mud elementals can also be created from a [scroll of elementalism](/wiki/Scroll_of_elementalism "Scroll of elementalism").

### Messages

- The earth elemental turns into a roiling pile of mud!

**Acid elementals** are not randomly generated, but can be created from a [scroll of elementalism](/wiki/Scroll_of_elementalism "Scroll of elementalism").

Hostile **ice elementals** are guaranteed to appear on the [Plane of Ice](/wiki/Plane_of_Ice "Plane of Ice").[\[2\]](#cite_note-2) They can also be created from a [scroll of elementalism](/wiki/Scroll_of_elementalism "Scroll of elementalism"). However they are never randomly generated.

| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | No                                                                                                         |

| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 2500                                                                                                       |

| A magma elemental:* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* cannot pick up items.
* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* has a [thick hide](/wiki/Thick-skinned "Thick-skinned").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                            |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | [SpliceHack 1.1.0 monst.c L2211](https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/monst.c#L2211) |

**Magma elementals** turn into a pool of [lava](/wiki/Lava "Lava") when they die.[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

### Generation

Magma elementals are not randomly generated. There is one guaranteed in [Mephisto's Lair](/wiki/Mephisto%27s_Lair "Mephisto's Lair").[\[4\]](#cite_note-4) They can also be created from a [scroll of elementalism](/wiki/Scroll_of_elementalism "Scroll of elementalism").

### Strategy

Be careful where you kill a magma elemental: a pool of lava can make an area more difficult to traverse.

### Messages

- The magma elemental's body dissolves into a pool of lava.

* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no limbs.

**Plasma elementals** are extremely fast and can engulf you, similar to air elementals. However they only do fire and shock damage.

### Generation

Plasma elementals are never randomly generated. Some plasma elementals are guaranteed on the [Plane of Ice](/wiki/Plane_of_Ice "Plane of Ice").[\[5\]](#cite_note-5) They can also be created from a [scroll of elementalism](/wiki/Scroll_of_elementalism "Scroll of elementalism").

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                            |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 8                                                                                                          |
| **Base [experience](/wiki/Experience_points "Experience points")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | ?                                                                                                          |
| **[Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 18                                                                                                         |
| **Base [AC](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 2                                                                                                          |
| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 30                                                                                                         |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 0 (neutral)                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                            |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | 0 (Not randomly generated)                                                                                 |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | No                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                            |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | 0                                                                                                          |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | 0                                                                                                          |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | Huge                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                            |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | poison,fire,petrification                                                                                  |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | None                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                            |
| A plasma elemental:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* can [swim](/wiki/Swim "Swim").
* can [phase](/wiki/Phase "Phase") through walls.
* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* [does not have a solid form](/wiki/Unsolid "Unsolid").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                            |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | [SpliceHack 1.1.0 monst.c L2225](https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/monst.c#L2225) |

**Fusion elementals** are somewhat fast and have four attacks. When they die, they break into four other elementals.[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)

### Generation

Fusion elementals *cannot* be created from a [scroll of elementalism](/wiki/Scroll_of_elementalism "Scroll of elementalism"), and also are never randomly generated. There is one guaranteed fusion elemental in the [Gemstone Array](/wiki/Gemstone_Array "Gemstone Array")[\[7\]](#cite_note-7), and another in the [City of Brass](/wiki/City_of_Brass "City of Brass")[\[8\]](#cite_note-8).

### Strategy

It is usually better to avoid fusion elementals than fight. Both the Gemstone Array and City of Brass have tight corridors where you can easily get surrounded if four extra elementals appear.

### Messages

- The fusion elemental tears apart into its constituent elements!

## History

The following elementals existed in SpliceHack 0.8.2, but were [removed](/wiki/Defunct_features_\(SpliceHack\) "Defunct features (SpliceHack)") in SpliceHack 1.0.0:

- E [storm elemental](/index.php?title=Storm_elemental\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Storm elemental (page does not exist)")
- E [Time Elemental](/wiki/Time_Elemental "Time Elemental")

The acid and plasma elementals were added in SpliceHack 1.0.0.

The magma elemental, mud elemental, ice elemental and (now-defunct) storm elemental were all added in SpliceHack 0.7.1.[\[9\]](#cite_note-9)

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/zap.c#L191>
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/ice.lua#L36>
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/mon.c#L2957>
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/mephisto.lua#L43>
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/ice.lua#L47>
6. [↑](#cite_ref-6) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/mon.c#L2698>
7. [↑](#cite_ref-7) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/gemarray.lua#L31>
8. [↑](#cite_ref-8) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/brass.lua#L126>
9. [↑](#cite_ref-9) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/commit/c33efa21559cc047f68078c82bb71ebc1ec464ee>
html:
Elemental (SpliceHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

SpliceHack adds many new varieties of elemental E monsters.

Contents

  • 1 Mud elemental
    • 1.1 Generation
    • 1.2 Messages
  • 2 Acid elemental
  • 3 Ice elemental
  • 4 Magma elemental
    • 4.1 Generation
    • 4.2 Strategy
    • 4.3 Messages
  • 5 Plasma elemental
    • 5.1 Generation
  • 6 Fusion elemental
    • 6.1 Generation
    • 6.2 Strategy
    • 6.3 Messages
  • 7 History
  • 8 References

Mud elemental

E mud elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 11
Attacks Claw 4d6, Claw 1d6 blind
E mud elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 11
Attacks

Claw 4d6, Claw 1d6 blind

Base level 8
Base experience ?
Speed 6
Base AC 2
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 2500
Nutritional value 0
Size Huge
Resistances fire, cold, poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed None

A mud elemental:

  • can swim.
  • can phase through walls.
  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not have a solid form.
  • has a thick hide.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is strong.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference SpliceHack 1.1.0 monst.c L2188

Mud elementals are very similar to earth elementals, but have an extra blinding attack and the ability to swim.

Generation

Mud elementals are never randomly generated. If an earth elemental is hit with a wand of water, it will turn into a mud elemental.[1] Mud elementals can also be created from a scroll of elementalism.

Messages

The earth elemental turns into a roiling pile of mud!

Acid elemental

E acid elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks Claw 3d6 acid, Passive 0d4 acid
E acid elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks

Claw 3d6 acid, Passive 0d4 acid

Base level 8
Base experience ?
Speed 6
Base AC 2
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 2500
Nutritional value 0
Size Huge
Resistances fire, cold, poison, acid
Resistances conveyed None

An acid elemental:

  • can swim.
  • can phase through walls.
  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not have a solid form.
  • has a thick hide.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is strong.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference SpliceHack 1.1.0 monst.c L2196

Acid elementals are not randomly generated, but can be created from a scroll of elementalism.

Ice elemental

E ice elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks Claw 5d6, Passive 0d4 cold
E ice elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks

Claw 5d6, Passive 0d4 cold

Base level 8
Base experience ?
Speed 6
Base AC 2
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 2500
Nutritional value 0
Size Huge
Resistances poison, cold, petrification
Resistances conveyed None

An ice elemental:

  • can swim.
  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is strong.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference SpliceHack 1.1.0 monst.c L2204

Hostile ice elementals are guaranteed to appear on the Plane of Ice.[2] They can also be created from a scroll of elementalism. However they are never randomly generated.

Magma elemental

E magma elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks Claw 4d5 fire, Passive 0d4 fire
E magma elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks

Claw 4d5 fire, Passive 0d4 fire

Base level 8
Base experience ?
Speed 6
Base AC 2
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 2500
Nutritional value 0
Size Huge
Resistances fire
Resistances conveyed None

A magma elemental:

  • does not breathe.
  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • has a thick hide.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference SpliceHack 1.1.0 monst.c L2211

Magma elementals turn into a pool of lava when they die.[3]

Generation

Magma elementals are not randomly generated. There is one guaranteed in Mephisto's Lair.[4] They can also be created from a scroll of elementalism.

Strategy

Be careful where you kill a magma elemental: a pool of lava can make an area more difficult to traverse.

Messages

The magma elemental's body dissolves into a pool of lava.

Plasma elemental

E plasma elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 14
Attacks Claw 2d6 fire, Engulf 1d10 shock
E plasma elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 14
Attacks

Claw 2d6 fire, Engulf 1d10 shock

Base level 8
Base experience ?
Speed 36
Base AC 2
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 0
Nutritional value 0
Size Huge
Resistances poison,fire,shock,petrification
Resistances conveyed None

A plasma elemental:

  • can fly.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not have a solid form.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is strong.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference SpliceHack 1.1.0 monst.c L2218

Plasma elementals are extremely fast and can engulf you, similar to air elementals. However they only do fire and shock damage.

Generation

Plasma elementals are never randomly generated. Some plasma elementals are guaranteed on the Plane of Ice.[5] They can also be created from a scroll of elementalism.

Fusion elemental

E fusion elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 25
Attacks Claw 2d6 fire, Claw 2d6 physical, Claw 2d6 physical, Engulf 1d10 physical
E fusion elemental (No tile)
Difficulty 25
Attacks

Claw 2d6 fire, Claw 2d6 physical, Claw 2d6 physical, Engulf 1d10 physical

Base level 8
Base experience ?
Speed 18
Base AC 2
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 0
Nutritional value 0
Size Huge
Resistances poison,fire,petrification
Resistances conveyed None

A plasma elemental:

  • can fly.
  • can swim.
  • can phase through walls.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not have a solid form.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is strong.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference SpliceHack 1.1.0 monst.c L2225

Fusion elementals are somewhat fast and have four attacks. When they die, they break into four other elementals.[6]

Generation

Fusion elementals cannot be created from a scroll of elementalism, and also are never randomly generated. There is one guaranteed fusion elemental in the Gemstone Array[7], and another in the City of Brass[8].

Strategy

It is usually better to avoid fusion elementals than fight. Both the Gemstone Array and City of Brass have tight corridors where you can easily get surrounded if four extra elementals appear.

Messages

The fusion elemental tears apart into its constituent elements!

History

The following elementals existed in SpliceHack 0.8.2, but were removed in SpliceHack 1.0.0:

  • E storm elemental
  • E Time Elemental

The acid and plasma elementals were added in SpliceHack 1.0.0.

The magma elemental, mud elemental, ice elemental and (now-defunct) storm elemental were all added in SpliceHack 0.7.1.[9]

References

  1. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/zap.c#L191
  2. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/ice.lua#L36
  3. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/mon.c#L2957
  4. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/mephisto.lua#L43
  5. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/ice.lua#L47
  6. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/mon.c#L2698
  7. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/gemarray.lua#L31
  8. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/brass.lua#L126
  9. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/commit/c33efa21559cc047f68078c82bb71ebc1ec464ee

[[SpliceHack]] adds many new varieties of [[elemental]] {{white|E}} monsters.

<!--Cannot use simpletabs here, as only up to 4 tabs are supported-->
==Mud elemental==
{{monster
 |name=mud elemental
 |symbol={{brown|E}}
 |difficulty=11

 |experience=?
 |speed=6
 |AC=2
 |MR=30

 |weight=2500
 |nutr=0
 |size=Huge
 |resistances=fire, cold, poison, petrification
 |resistances conveyed=None
 |attributes={{attributes|A mud elemental|
 |nocorpse=1|noeyes=1|nolimbs=1|nohead=1|=
 |mindless=1|breathless=1|wallwalk=1|thick=1|strong=1|neuter=1|unsolid=1|amphibious=1|swim=1}}
 |reference=[https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/monst.c#L2188 SpliceHack 1.1.0 monst.c L2188]
}}

'''Mud elementals''' are very similar to earth elementals, but have an extra [[blind]]ing attack and the ability to [[swim]].

===Generation===
Mud elementals are never randomly generated. If an earth elemental is hit with a [[wand of water]], it will turn into a mud elemental.<ref>https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/zap.c#L191</ref> Mud elementals can also be created from a [[scroll of elementalism]].

===Messages===
{{message|The earth elemental turns into a roiling pile of mud!}}
{{clear}}

Magma elementals are not randomly generated. There is one guaranteed in [[Mephisto's Lair]].<ref>https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/mephisto.lua#L43</ref> They can also be created from a [[scroll of elementalism]].

===Strategy===
Be careful where you kill a magma elemental: a pool of lava can make an area more difficult to traverse.

}}
'''Plasma elementals''' are extremely fast and can engulf you, similar to air elementals. However they only do fire and shock damage.

===Generation===
Plasma elementals are never randomly generated. Some plasma elementals are guaranteed on the [[Plane of Ice]].<ref>https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/ice.lua#L47</ref> They can also be created from a [[scroll of elementalism]].

==Fusion elemental==
{{monster
 |name=fusion elemental
 |symbol={{magenta|E}}
 |difficulty=25
 |level=8
 |experience=?
 |speed=18
 |AC=2
 |MR=30
 |align=0
 |frequency=0
 |genocidable=No
 |attacks=Claw 2d6 fire, Claw 2d6 physical, Claw 2d6 physical, Engulf 1d10 physical
 |weight=0
 |nutr=0
 |size=Huge
 |resistances=poison,fire,petrification
 |resistances conveyed=None
 |attributes={{attributes|A plasma elemental|
 |nocorpse=1|noeyes=1|nolimbs=1|nohead=1|=
 |mindless=1|breathless=1|unsolid=1|fly=1|swim=1|wallwalk=1|strong=1|neuter=1}}
 |reference=[https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/monst.c#L2225 SpliceHack 1.1.0 monst.c L2225]
}}
'''Fusion elementals''' are somewhat fast and have four attacks. When they die, they break into four other elementals.<ref>https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/mon.c#L2698</ref>

===Generation===
Fusion elementals ''cannot'' be created from a [[scroll of elementalism]], and also are never randomly generated. There is one guaranteed fusion elemental in the [[Gemstone Array]]<ref>https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/gemarray.lua#L31</ref>, and another in the [[City of Brass]]<ref>https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/brass.lua#L126</ref>.

===Strategy===
It is usually better to avoid fusion elementals than fight. Both the Gemstone Array and City of Brass have tight corridors where you can easily get surrounded if four extra elementals appear.

===Messages===
{{message|The fusion elemental tears apart into its constituent elements!}}
{{clear}}

==History==
The following elementals existed in SpliceHack 0.8.2, but were [[Defunct features (SpliceHack)|removed]] in SpliceHack 1.0.0:
* {{gray|E}} [[storm elemental]]
* {{magenta|E}} [[Time Elemental]] 

The acid and plasma elementals were added in SpliceHack 1.0.0.

The magma elemental, mud elemental, ice elemental and (now-defunct) storm elemental were all added in SpliceHack 0.7.1.<ref>https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/commit/c33efa21559cc047f68078c82bb71ebc1ec464ee</ref>

==References==
<References />

[[Category:SpliceHack Monsters]]
